scripts.bump: npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm i && npm publish
scripts.migration:up:local: npm run build && cross-env ENV=local sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env local
scripts.migration:down:local: npm run build && cross-env ENV=local sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env local
scripts.migration:up:dev: npm run build && cross-env ENV=dev sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env dev
scripts.migration:down:dev: npm run build && cross-env ENV=dev sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env dev
scripts.migration:up:prod: npm run build && cross-env ENV=prod sequelize-cli db:migrate --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env prod
scripts.migration:down:prod: npm run build && cross-env ENV=prod sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --migrations-path ./dist/database/migrations --config ./dist/database/config.js --env prod
